name: Cube Space
description:
Cube Space is a Sokoban-based puzzle game, where your goal is to clear up the path for the spaceship to reach the exit and escape the level! Interact with special obstacles and think your way through each level for the spaceship to travel through the galaxy once more!



Move cubes, more, more and more! Move cubes around and let the path be nice and clear for the projectile to reach the exit!



Many mechanics and obstacles to interact with! Find new ways to clear the space and beat each level in a unique way!



Shoot at the exit! Whenever the path is free for the projectile to go, shoot at the exit, be free, and good luck in the next level!
